form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Moran introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To modify the boundary of the Fort Scott National Historic Site in the State of Kansas, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Fort Scott National Historic Site Boundary Modification Act.

subparagraph.text: by inserting or by purchase with appropriated funds after donation; and
by striking Sec. 2. When and inserting the following:
by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: The boundary of the Fort Scott National Historic Site established under subsection (a) is modified as generally depicted on the map referred to as Fort Scott National Historic Site Proposed Boundary Modification, numbered 471/80,057, and dated June 2015.
There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as are necessary to carry out the amendments made by subsection (a).
